Metamorph is a browser extension for Git analytics created by Indorse. 

Check whether a Git repo is being actively maintained. Easily find out the activity of any public/private Git repo.

It’s easy - just install the extension and visit any Git repo. You can immediately see the statistics on your screen without interfering with your workflow.

Features:-
Overview of the latest activity of a repo
Commit activity details
PR activity details
No need for sign-in or authentication for public repositories

Pro features dashboard - https://indorse.io/metamorph

Note: The Metamorph browser extension DOES NOT store or collect your code or data. The personal access token is required only for private repositories such that we can access them in-browser and display the analytics. The personal access token is stored in your browser’s local storage.

Also note that for a public repo without a personal access token, the Git API limits users to 60 API requests/hour. Hence if you want to access multiple repositories within that time frame, we suggest that you add your personal access token.
